title: Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Milton Apartment: Cabinet Radio/Phonograph", January 14, 1935
medium: Graphite, red, and blue color pencil, brown crayon, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8193/F.S./MILTON, S.H.K./S., 1/14/35, 1, S.H.K.; dimensions, instructions, materials in graphite and color pencil
description: Plan and elevation drawings for radio/phonograph cabinet. Rounded left side and raised right side. Body in macassar ebony, surface on raised right side, side, and base in black lacquer. Sliding opening on top of cabinet at left for phonograph; cabinet doors at front with horizontal polished chrome handles, interior vertical shelves inside cabinet for records. Radio inside right side of cabinet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Milton Apartment: Cabinet Radio/Phonograph", January 14, 1935.
January 14, 1935. Graphite, red, and blue color pencil, brown crayon, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-788.
